description:
Company & Culture

At GT’s Living Foods, LLC, we’ve stayed true to the authentic brewing process for over 25 years. Our #1 selling Kombucha is raw, organic, naturally effervescent, and handcrafted in small batches – always cultured, never compromised. We’re proud to remain a family owned & operated company. As our GT’s family continues to grow, we are deeply humbled and sincerely grateful for every moment of this journey with you.

Requirements

  • Experience: 4+ years of in purchasing, buying and/or procurement; CPG and/or packaging/indirect is preferred.
  • Computer Skills: Proficient in Microsoft Office and exposure to ERP/Microsoft Dynamics 365.
  • Education: Bachelor’s Degree in Supply Chain Management or related is preferred.


Job Description

In support of our Buyers, the Associate Buyer plays a critical role in holding suppliers accountable to the accepted purchasing methods, policies, and procedures of the Company. The Associate Buyer is responsible for supporting the procurement function of a commodity from intent to purchase through delivery of commodities.

Essential Duties And Responsibilities

  • Analyzing market and delivery conditions to determine present and future material availability
  • Generating market analysis reports
  • Assisting in evaluating vendor quotations
  • Maintaining supplier relationships that provide high quality products and services at the best price, while maintaining the highest code of quality, ethics and conduct
  • Preparing, issuing, and reviewing purchase orders, change notices, order claims, bids, and vendor agreements for legal correctness, price, and acceptability of items to specifications and Company guidelines


Knowledge, Skills & Abilities

  • Basic knowledge of negotiation fundamentals
  • Effective verbal and written communication skills
  • Ability to think analytically
  • Ability to effectively multi-task in a fast-paced environment
  • Strong organizational skills with the ability to prioritize department and company objectives
  • Strong interpersonal skills with the ability to build and support supplier relationships


GT’s Employee Experience (Benefits/Perks)

  • Health Insurance: Medical, Dental, Vision, LTD Life & Disability
  • 401K with Matching
  • Employee Assistance Program
  • Discounts on the amazing GT’s product line
  • Corporate Discounts with our partners thru LifeMart (concert & sporting event tickets, cell phone service, gifts, restaurants, hotels, gyms, childcare, and more!)
  • Others: on-site corporate gym, food trucks every weekday, etc.


Job Details

  • Work Hours: Business hours.
  • Work Attire: Use good judgement, keeping in mind the nature of their work, their own safety and the safety of others, and their need to interact with the public.
  • Pay Range: $66,560 to $70,000


GT's Living Foods, LLC is an Equal Opportunity Employer committed to hiring a diverse workforce and maintaining an inclusive culture. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, national origin, protected veteran status, disability or any other basis protected under federal, state or local laws.
